attributes.action: Request the televising of the Council of the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Council of the European Union also known as the Council of Ministers is a key-decision making and legislative arm of the European Union. It is made up of ministers from each of the 27 countries.
The meetings are held behind closed doors.

Televising these meetings would increase the public's interest in the workings of the E.U. While it is not within the PM's remit to bring this about per se, he is is entitled to suggest it to his EU counterparts.
